metadata.name: I Love The Sound Of Music
metadata.description:
This album was crafted in 2021 between March & June. Inspired by the NFT space and how it blends with music. 

It was created with the concept of making musical paintings. Poetic Streams Of Consciousness riddled with the question of imperfection. Reminded by the resurrection of creative flow, and what it means to let go. A place in time that's whispering, while the world is full of shout. Somehow in all this madness, I hear you calling out. 

"I Love The Sound Of Music" - Ring Tailed Lemur 

All Songs written, performed, & produced by Joe Nix (RTL). Featuring Ash Nix (Axl), & Josiah Nix (DSR) From 'The Band' on Drums/Bass/Vocals. 

In Partnership with Heartistry.

Enjoy.

1. Out To Blue  
2. Day 2  
3. Grace Of Your Heart (Ft. The Band)  
4. Bored Ape  
5. Chernobyl  
6. Pizza Mind  
7. Day 1  
8. Beach Painting  
9. Panel Of Joe's  
 
Copyright remains with original creator Joe Nix for all time 2021

Thanks for listening. 

Stay Bright x
